about_the_game:
.
A mere toe in the future.
Yomori-shi, a town full of strange happenings.

There, a strange visitor appears.
And Ayamu Jinnai, who lives in the town, is just an ordinary girl.
Except that she is a powerful medium and has the ability to see spirits.
She and her occult-enthusiast sister, Makoto Jinnai, are going to confront the bizarre!

.

Ayama Jinnai


.
The protagonist of this work
She is a "psychic girl" with powerful psychic vision and a mediumistic constitution.
She uses her abilities to solve bizarre cases with both of her sisters.

Makoto Jinnai

[/img
.
Occult enthusiast and martial artist.
Ayama's sister who is undefeated in 7 kickboxing fights.
She can't see any spirits, but she uses her physicality and occult knowledge to fight the weird.


This is an adventure novel with occult and horror elements.
The story is told through point-and-click exploration, the use of items and ability icons such as "spirit vision," and choices.
The story is told through choices you make.
The difficulty level is quite low, and the game progresses quickly with an emphasis on the story experience.
There are a few branches, but it is almost a one-way adventure novel.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10/ 11

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

short_description: Just a few toes into the future. Yomori-shi, a town full of strange happenings. And Ayamu Jinnai is just an ordinary girl. Except that she is a powerful medium and has the ability to see spirits. She and her occult-enthusiast sister, Makoto, are determined to fight the bizarre.
